How to install,
The Chronicles Of Riddick: Assault On Dark Athena

- Install the game.
- Run the patch 1.01
- Run the TagesSetup_x64.exe download via this link:
http://www.tagesprotection.com/main.htm?page=5.5.htm

- Copy the files like the description
- Run the crack.
- Enjoy.

"You're not afraid of the dark, are you?"

Vca.bin and key.txt goes to:
C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data\Tages\100663362  Windows XP

OR

C:\ProgramData\Tages\100663362    Windows Vista or Windows 7
Patch.exe must be inside the folder where DarkAthena.exe is located (System\Bin32_x86)

This is an updated guide on how to install
The Chronicles Of Riddick: Assault On Dark Athena.

- Install the game.
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5022475/The_Chronicles_Of_Riddick_Assault_On_Dark_Athena_PC

- Run the patch 1.01 
(The.Chronicles.Of.Riddick.Assault.On.Dark.Athena-ArenaBG\Update).

- Download and run the updated TagesSetup_x64.exe or TagesSetup.exe
(http://www.tagesprotection.com/main.htm?page=5.5.htm).

- Run the game (only the activation window should be visual) 
then close the window (don't worry the ''\Tages\100663362'' 
folders are created after this very first run),
now follow the next steeps carefully.

- Copy the files into the correct folders:

#Windows XP#
C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data\Tages\100663362

#Windows Vista/ Windows 7#
C:\ProgramData\Tages\100663362

- Run the crack (you put the crack file within the game's directory
''System\Win32_x86'' folder, Vista and 7 users will have to ''run it as an administrator''.

- Now enjoy a free copy of The Chronicles Of Riddick: Assault On Dark Athena.

Best regards
Mathias921 of The Pirate Bay
